actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to waive the time limitations relating to the award of the Congressional Medal of Honor to Tibor Rubin for distinguishing himself by acts of valor during the Korean War.

summary.text: Waives time limitations relating to the award of a medal of honor to a named individual for distinguished service during the Korean War.

titles.title: A bill to waive the time limitations relating to the award of the Congressional Medal of Honor to Tibor Rubin for distinguishing himself by acts of valor during the Korean War.
